column4: can anyone explain how my logitech keyboard's shortcut for calculator actually works in ubuntu with no configuration? hah
must be some kind of standard
so weird eh? but the other shortcuts don't work except volume and probably pause/play
yea probably; i already found it crazy enough that the volume dial on mine works too hah
the ones that dont work might have some weird scan codes
scan codes? i'm not that smart haha
System -> Preferences -> Keyboard Shortcuts.. Try to set one up
i'm running a laptop and i have this keyboard attached via usb, but it doesn't work at the GRUB boot menu (sometimes i boot into windows)....but it works at the login for ubuntu; any ideas?
sometimes theres a BIOS setting for usb stuff related to mice/keyboards
yea i was thinkign that might be it; i didn't notice these keyboard shortcuts here! nice
if the key isn't recognized (doesn't do anything when you press it during the capture) then its some weird scan code, and you've got to do some magic to get 'em to work
thanks a lot; actually all of them are registering :D
do you know how i can add my own keyboard shortcut for custom programs (i.e. skype)?
I'm just ssh'd in, so I can't see my desktop. but I believe there's a way to launch a custom launcher
hmm i'll just google it and stop being lazy haha
alright i'm getting out of here...thanks a lot
